## Day 1 Practice

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

### Import csv from URL

```{r import}
leso <- read_csv("https://github.com/utdata/rwdir/blob/main/data-raw/leso.csv?raw=true") %>% clean_names()

leso %>% head()
```

### glimpse it

```{r glimpse}
leso %>% glimpse()
```

### Get summary stats

```{r summary}
leso %>% summary()
```

## Day 2, Part 1

Filter to state and remove unneeded columns

```{r}
tx <- leso %>% 
  filter(state == "TX") %>% 
  select(-c(sheet, state, nsn), -starts_with("demil"))

tx %>% glimpse()
```

### Most expensive item

```{r}
tx %>% 
  arrange(acquisition_value %>% desc())
```
